assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Frontier Management Inc. provides management consulting, merger and acquisition (M&A) advisory, management executive, and business revitalization support services in Japan and internationally. The company also provides a range of business solutions in the areas of business succession, post M&A, cross-border M&A support, and governance, risk, and compliance services. It serves retail/restaurants, consumer goods, industrial goods, business, finance, accounting, law, and other markets. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
